SourceText: Thanks for taking the time to complete your childâ€™s development assessment. ðŸŒ±This short activity is to help you better understand how @fields.child_nickname is growing and learning.
text: Terima kasih kerana meluangkan masa untuk melengkapkan penilaian perkembangan anak anda. ðŸŒ± Aktiviti ringkas ini bertujuan untuk membantu anda memahami dengan lebih baik bagaimana @fields.child_nickname sedang membesar dan belajar.
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Every child develops in their own way. This tool is not a professional test, and is just here to help you learn about activities that support your childâ€™s positive growth. ðŸ’š
text: Setiap anak membesar dengan tahap perkembangan sendiri. Alat ini bukan ujian profesional, tetapi hanya bertujuan untuk membantu anda mengenal pasti aktiviti yang dapat menyokong perkembangan positif anak anda. ðŸ’š

SourceText: Letâ€™s get started! Just answer the questions as best as you can. There are no right or wrong answers. ðŸ˜Š
text: Jom kita mulakan! Jawab sahaja soalan-soalan ini sebaik mungkin. Tiada jawapan yang betul atau salah. ðŸ˜Š

SourceText: Thanks for taking the time to complete your childâ€™s development assessment. ðŸŒ±This short activity is to help you better understand how your child is growing and learning.
text: Terima kasih kerana meluangkan masa untuk melengkapkan penilaian perkembangan anak anda. ðŸŒ± Aktiviti ringkas ini bertujuan untuk membantu anda memahami dengan lebih baik bagaimana anak anda sedang membesar dan belajar.

SourceText: Does your child have difficulty seeing or hearing sounds like peoplesâ€™ voices or music, even with glasses or hearing aids?
text: Adakah anak anda menghadapi kesukaran melihat atau mendengar bunyi seperti suara orang lain atau muzik walaupun dengan menggunakan cermin mata atau alat bantu pendengaran?

SourceText: It seems like you're worried about your child's eyesight or hearing, and they might need help from a professional.
text: Nampaknya anda bimbang tentang penglihatan atau pendengaran anak anda, dan dia mungkin memerlukan bantuan pakar.

SourceText: Here are some resources that might help
text: Ini merupakan sumber yang mungkin membantu:

SourceText: {development resources 1}
text: {development resources 1}

SourceText: Sorry, I don't understand what you mean.
text: Maaf, saya tidak faham apa yang anda maksudkan.

SourceText: Compared with children of the same age, does your child have difficulty walking?
text: Adakah anak anda mempunyai kesukaran untuk berjalan, berbanding dengan kanak-kanak sebaya mereka?

SourceText: It seems like you're worried about your child's ability to move around, and they might need assistance from a professional.
text: Nampaknya anda bimbang tentang kemampuan anak anda untuk bergerak, dan dia mungkin memerlukan bantuan pakar.

SourceText: Does your child have difficulty with self-care such as feeding or dressing him/herself?
text: Adakah anak anda mengalami kesukaran dalam penjagaan kendiri seperti makan atau berpakaian sendiri?

SourceText: It seems like you are concerned about your child's ability to take care of themselves, and they might need help from a professional.
text: Nampaknya anda bimbang tentang kemampuan anak anda untuk menjaga diri sendiri, dan dia mungkin memerlukan bantuan pakar.

SourceText: Does your child have difficulty being understood by others?
text: Adakah anak anda mengalami kesukaran untuk difahami oleh orang lain?

SourceText: It seems like you're worried about how your child communicates, and they might need help from a professional.
text: Nampaknya anda bimbang tentang cara anak anda berkomunikasi, dan dia mungkin memerlukan bantuan pakar.

SourceText: Does your child have difficulty learning or remembering things, focusing on an activity that he or she enjoys doing, or accepting changes in his or her routine?
text: Adakah anak anda menghadapi kesukaran untuk belajar atau mengingati sesuatu perkara, menumpukan kepada aktiviti yang disukai, atau menerima perubahan dalam rutin harian?

SourceText: It seems like you're worried about how your child is able to think or understand things, and they might need help from a professional.
text: Nampaknya anda bimbang tentang bagaimana anak anda mampu berfikir atau memahami perkara, dan dia mungkin memerlukan bantuan pakar.

SourceText: Compared with children of the same age, does your child have difficulty controlling their behaviour, such as fighting, screaming, or breaking rules?
text: Adakah anak anda sukar untuk mengawal tingkah laku mereka, seperti bergaduh, menjerit atau melanggar peraturan berbanding dengan rakan sebaya mereka?

SourceText: It seems like you are concerned about your child's behaviour, and they might need help from a professional.
text: Nampaknya anda bimbang tentang tingkah laku anak anda, dan dia mungkin memerlukan bantuan pakar.

SourceText: Does your child have difficulty making friends?
text: Adakah anak anda sukar untuk bergaul dengan rakan-rakan lain?

SourceText: It seems that you're worried about your child's ability to interact with others, and they might need assistance from a professional.
text: Nampaknya anda bimbang tentang kemampuan anak anda untuk berinteraksi dengan orang lain, dan dia mungkin memerlukan bantuan pakar.

SourceText: How often does your child seem very anxious, nervous, worried, sad, or depressed?
text: Adakah anak anda sering mengalami gejala kerisauan, gugup, bimbang, sedih atau kemurungan yang melampau?

SourceText: It seems like you're worried about how your child is feeling, and they might need assistance from a professional.
text: Anak anda mungkin memerlukan bantuan daripada seorang pakar jika anda berasa bimbang tentang kesejahteraan emosi mereka.

SourceText: Youâ€™re finished! Thank you for taking the time! Remember, while this is not a professional test and is not a diagnosis tool, you may notice a few developmental milestones where extra support could be helpful. If you want to speak with a professional, here are some resources that might help
text: Anda telah selesai! Terima kasih kerana meluangkan masa. Walaupun ini bukan ujian profesional, anda mungkin perasan beberapa perkembangan anak yang perlukan sokongan tambahan. Jika perlu, berikut sumber yang boleh membantu:

SourceText: Youâ€™re finished! Thank you for taking the time! Remember, this is not a professional test, but a tool to help you better understand how @fields.child_nickname is growing and learning. It looks like your child is developing well. That's great!
text: Anda telah selesai! Terima kasih kerana meluangkan masa. Ini bukan ujian profesional, tetapi alat untuk membantu anda memahami bagaimana @fields.child_nickname sedang membesar dan belajar. Nampaknya anak anda sedang berkembang dengan baik. Bagus sekali!
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Remember, if you ever need support type {HELP}.
text: Ingat, taip {HELP} jika anda memerlukan sokongan.

SourceText: Youâ€™re finished! Thank you for taking the time! Remember, this is not a professional test, but a tool to help you better understand how your child is growing and learning. It looks like your child is developing well. That's great!
text: Anda telah selesai! Terima kasih kerana meluangkan masa. Ini bukan ujian profesional, tetapi alat untuk membantu anda memahami bagaimana anak anda sedang membesar dan belajar. Nampaknya anak anda sedang berkembang dengan baik. Bagus sekali!

SourceText: Every child grows and learns differently. This tool can help find areas where your child might need assistance. To make it work, you need to answer all 10 questions.
text: Setiap kanak-kanak berkembang dan belajar dengan cara yang berbeza. Alat penilaian ini dapat mengenal pasti jenis bantuan yang diperlukan oleh anak anda. Untuk melihat sama ada alat ini berkesan, anda perlu menjawab kesemua 10 soalan.

SourceText: How much is your child doing each of these things?
text: Untuk setiap perkara ini, sejauh manakah kemajuan anak anda?

SourceText: Names at least 5 body parts - like nose, hand, or tummy
text: Menamakan sekurang-kurangnya 5 bahagian badan - seperti hidung, tangan, atau perut

SourceText: Climbs up a ladder at a playground
text: Memanjat tangga di taman permainan

SourceText: Uses words like "me" or "mine"
text: Menggunakan perkataan seperti "saya" atau "saya punya"

SourceText: Jumps off the ground with two feet
text: Melompat menggunakan dua kaki

SourceText: Puts 2 or more words together - like "more water" or "go outside"
text: Menggabungkan 2 perkataan atau lebih dalam satu masa - seperti "nak air" atau "pergi keluar"

SourceText: Uses words to ask for help
text: Menggunakan perkataan untuk meminta bantuan

SourceText: Names at least one colour
text: Menamakan sekurang-kurangnya satu warna

SourceText: Tries to get you to watch by saying "Look at me"
text: Cuba mendapatkan perhatian anda dengan berkata "Tengok saya"

SourceText: Says his or her first name when asked
text: Mampu menyebut nama pertama mereka jika ada yang bertanya

SourceText: Draws lines
text: Melukis garisan

SourceText: Your child is growing and learning well. It is okay if they can't do everything mentioned in the questions. Most children can't do all of those things!
text: Anak anda sedang berkembang dan belajar dengan baik. Tidak mengapa jika mereka tidak dapat melakukan semua yang dinyatakan dalam soalan. Kebanyakan kanak-kanak tidak boleh melakukan semua perkara itu!

SourceText: If you ever need help, just type {HELP}.
text: Jika anda perlu bantuan, taip {HELP}.

SourceText: It seems that your child might need help from a professional. Make sure to check with one to see if your child is growing and learning well.
text: Nampaknya anak anda mungkin memerlukan bantuan daripada seorang pakar. Pastikan anda berunding dengan pakar untuk melihat sama ada anak anda sedang membesar dan belajar dengan baik.

SourceText: Talks so other people can understand him or her most of the time
text: Bercakap dengan jelas supaya orang lain dapat memahami mereka pada kebanyakan masa

SourceText: Washes and dries hands without help (an adult can help turn on the water)
text: Membasuh dan mengeringkan tangan dengan sendiri (orang dewasa boleh membantu membuka paip di singki)

SourceText: Asks questions beginning with "why" or "how" - like "Why no cookie?"
text: Mampu bertanya soalan yang bermula dengan "kenapa" atau "bagaimana" - seperti "Kenapa tiada biskut?"

SourceText: Explains the reasons for things, like needing a sweater when it's cold
text: Menerangkan sebab-sebab sesuatu perkara, seperti perlunya memakai baju tebal ketika cuaca sejuk

SourceText: Compares things - using words like "bigger" or "shorter"
text: Menggunakan perkataan seperti "lebih besar" atau "lebih pendek" untuk membandingkan sesuatu

SourceText: Answers questions like "What do you do when you are cold?" or "â€¦when you are sleepy?"
text: Soalan seperti "Apa yang kamu lakukan ketika sejuk?" atau "â€¦bila kamu akan mengantuk?" dapat dijawab dengan baik

SourceText: Answers questions like "What do you do when you are cold?" or "â€¦when you are sleepy?
text: Soalan seperti "Apa yang kamu lakukan ketika sejuk?" atau "â€¦apabila kamu mengantuk? dapat dijawab dengan baik

SourceText: Tells you a story from a book or TV
text: Bercerita kepada anda kisah daripada buku atau TV

SourceText: Draws simple shapes - like a circle or a square
text: Melukis bentuk mudah seperti bulatan atau segi empat sama

SourceText: Says words like "feet" for more than one foot and "men" for more than one man
text: Menggunakan kata ganda seperti "buku-buku" untuk menunjukkan lebih daripada satu buku dan "kucing-kucing" menunjukkan lebih daripada seekor kucing

SourceText: Uses words like "yesterday" and "tomorrow" correctly
text: Perkataan seperti "semalam" dan "hari ini" digunakan dengan betul

SourceText: Stays dry all night
text: Tidak membuang air kecil ketika tidur di waktu malam

SourceText: Follows simple rules when playing a board game or card game
text: Dapat mengikut peraturan mudah ketika bermain permainan papan (board game) atau permainan kad

SourceText: Prints his or her name
text: Menulis nama mereka dengan betul

SourceText: Draws pictures you recognise
text: Melukis gambar yang dikenali

SourceText: When was @fields.child_nickname born? Enter their date of birth in the following format: DD/MM/YYYY. For example, if your child was born on May 19, 2015, enter 19/05/2015.
text: Bilakah tarikh lahir @fields.child_nickname? Sila masukkan dalam format berikut: HH/BB/TTTT. Contohnya, jika anak anda lahir pada 19 Mei 2015, taip 19/05/2015.
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: When was your child born? Enter their date of birth in the following format: DD/MM/YYYY. For example, if your child was born on May 19, 2015, enter 19/05/2015.
text: Bilakah tarikh lahir anak anda? Masukkan tarikh lahir mereka mengikut format ini: HH/BB/TTTT. Sebagai contoh: masukkan 19/05/2015 jika anak anda lahir pada 19 Mei 2015.

SourceText: Sorry, this date is invalid. Please write your child's date of birth in this way: DD/MM/YYYY. For example, if your child was born on May 19, 2015, write 19/05/2015.
text: Maaf, tarikh ini tidak sah. Masukkan tarikh lahir anak anda seperti ini: HH/BB/TTTT. Sebagai contoh, masukkan 19/05/2015 jika anak anda lahir pada 19 Mei 2015.

SourceText: The date you entered is in the future. Please write your child's date of birth in this way: DD/MM/YYYY. For example, if your child was born on May 19, 2015, write 19/05/2015.
text: Maaf, tarikh yang anda masukkan masih belum tiba. Masukkan tarikh lahir anak anda seperti ini: HH/BB/TTTT. Sebagai contoh, masukkan 19/05/2015 jika anak anda lahir pada 19 Mei 2015.

SourceText: Your child was born on @(replace(format_date(results.date, "DD-MM-YYYY"), "-", "/")), is that correct?
text: Anak anda dilahirkan pada @(replace(format_date(results.date, "DD-MM-YYYY"), "-", "/")), adakah ini betul?
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Let's try again. Please write your child's date of birth in this way: DD/MM/YYYY. For example, if your child was born on May 19, 2015, write 19/05/2015.
text: Sila cuba sekali lagi. Masukkan tarikh lahir anak anda seperti ini: HH/BB/TTTT. Sebagai contoh, masukkan 19/05/2015 jika anak anda lahir pada 19 Mei 2015.

SourceText: According to the date you provided, @fields.child_nickname would be under 23 months old. This tool is only for children aged over 23 months. Please enter a valid date.
text: Berdasarkan tarikh yang anda berikan, @fields.child_nickname berumur kurang daripada 23 bulan. Alat ini hanya untuk kanak-kanak berumur lebih daripada 23 bulan. Sila masukkan tarikh yang sah.
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: According to the date you provided, your child would be under 23 months old. This tool is only for children aged over 23 months. Please enter a valid date.
text: Berdasarkan tarikh yang anda berikan, anak anda berumur kurang daripada 23 bulan. Alat ini hanya untuk kanak-kanak berumur lebih daripada 23 bulan. Sila masukkan tarikh yang sah.

SourceText: According to the date you gave, @fields.child_nickname would be @(round_down(datetime_diff(results.date,now(),"Y"))) years old. This tool is only for children aged 2-9. Please enter a valid date.
text: Berdasarkan tarikh yang anda berikan, @fields.child_nickname berusia @(round_down(datetime_diff(results.date,now(),"Y"))) tahun. Penilaian Perkembangan ini hanya untuk anak-anak yang berumur 2 hingga 9 tahun. Sila masukkan tarikh yang sah.
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: According to the date you gave, your child would be @(round_down(datetime_diff(results.date,now(),"Y"))) years old. This tool is only for children aged 2-9. Please enter a valid date.
text: Berdasarkan tarikh yang anda berikan, anak anda berusia @(round_down(datetime_diff(results.date,now(),"Y"))) tahun. Penilaian Perkembangan ini hanya untuk anak-anak yang berumur 2 hingga 9 tahun. Sila masukkan tarikh yang sah.
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: No Difficulty
text: Tidak Sukar
note: This is a quick reply and its translation should be uniquely identified by the corresponding argument

SourceText: Some Difficulty
text: Sedikit Sukar
note: This is a quick reply and its translation should be uniquely identified by the corresponding argument

SourceText: A Lot of Difficulty
text: Sangat Sukar
note: This is a quick reply and its translation should be uniquely identified by the corresponding argument

SourceText: He or She Cannot See and/or Hear
text: Dia Tidak Dapat Melihat dan/atau Mendengar
note: This is a quick reply and its translation should be uniquely identified by the corresponding argument

text: Dia Tidak Dapat Berjalan

text: Dia Tidak Dapat Mengawal Tingkah Laku yang Negatif

text: Dia Tidak Dapat Bergaul dengan Rakan-Rakan
